law.catch_line: Court may probate will without summoning parties.
law.text: A District Court may, without summoning any party, proceed to probate and admit the will to record or reject it.
law.history: Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 360, effective January 2, 1978. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4860.
